jobInfo.jobName: Technical Writer 技术文档工程师
jobInfo.postDescription:
Semcon China is now looking for talented people to support us and our global customers with creating Automotive product information in the following areas: 思康中国现诚聘汽车售后信息领域的精英：
 
Vehicle Owner's manual 汽车车主手册
Vehicle Service and Repair information 汽车售后维修信息
 
 
If you have experience within the automotive industry and are interested in learning to create the information needed to support a vehicle in service, then we invite you to apply for the position of: 如果您有汽车行业的工作经验并对开发技术文档有兴趣，我们诚邀您的加入：
 
Information Editor/Author 技术文档工程师
  
Task(s): 工作职责
 
•         Talk proactively with engineering (R&D) department to collect the technical inputs to kick off the User Manual Content authoring. 
•         Creating technical content and graphics, communicate with the illustrators to review the images and approve the images. 
•         Keep communication with the client and other stakeholders to review the developed content to make sure the content is accurate and delivered as scheduled. 
•         Drive the process of content development from draft to release. 
•         Maintain and manage the information by configurations/versions within Content Management System 

 
Requirement(s): 职位要求 
•         3+ years’ experience within the automotive aftersales service industry. Automotive Service manual/User Manual development experience is preferred. 
•         Familiar with XML editors/illustration tools and authoring software( AI, PS, In-design, Visio, 3dVia/Solidworks Composer, Acrobat, XML editor, Arbortext, X-mental, PTC etc) 
•         High level English language skills (CET-4 and above) and 1 year+ working experience using English as the working language. 
•         Proactive communication both within the project team internally and with the client externally. 
•         Work independently with minimal supervision 
•         Process and quality oriented in the daily work.
 
 
Our offer: 我们提供： 
•         Opportunity to work for an international company国际化工作环境
•         Extensive training 岗位培训
•         Competitive remuneration 有竞争力的薪酬福利
jobInfo.address: 上海长宁区虹桥国际科技广场B座

brandComInfo.introduce:
Aleido is an Sweden-based international company with a long heritage of driving the development of aftermarket information and learning solutions. Our customers develop complex products or systems, or seek knowledge and confidence to create lasting change, within a wide range of industries including: automotive, telecom, advanced machinery, rail and medtech. We are almost a thousand colleagues in five countries. Together we bridge the gap between technology and the people who depend on it – by making the advanced simply understood.   
斓度是一家总部位于瑞典的跨国公司，长期致力于推动售后市场信息和学习解决方案的发展。我们的客户在汽车、电信、先进机械、铁路和医疗技术等众多行业开发复杂的产品或系统，寻求知识和增强信心以创造持久的变革。我们在五个国家拥有近千名员工。我们共同架起了技术与依赖技术的人们之间的桥梁--让先进的技术变得简单易懂。
